title: James Andrew Miller: "Tinderbox"
description: Michael sits down with James Andrew Miller, author of "Tinderbox: HBO's Ruthless Pursuit of New Frontiers." Original air date 3 December 2021. The book was published on 23 November 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, James Andrew Miller)
